segments.text: Are you busy with your work ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I'm very busy , too . Sometimes I work overtime .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Then your salary must be high .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Just so so . But we can travel twice every year .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Is this time one of them ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , we won't travel again until October .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Really ? We have only one chance every year .
segments.speaker: S2
